kassenSystem.model

Class ProductList

  • java.lang.Object
    • kassenSystem.model.ProductList

  • public class ProductList
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a list of Products.

    • Method Detail

      • addProduct

        public void addProduct(java.lang.String name,
                       long id,
                       int stock,
                       double weight,
                       java.lang.String weightUnit,
                       double price,
                       java.lang.String category)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Adds a new product to the productList. The parameters name, id, stock, weight and basePrice are entered by the user. The category will be supplied by the category list and will not be entered separately.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new product
        id - the identification number of the new product
        stock - the amount of units of the new product
        weight - the weight of the product
        weightUnit - the unit of the given weight e.g. g,kg,ml,l,stück
        price - the base price of the product
        category - the category the product will be assigned to
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if product id is already used by a product in the list

      • addProduct

        public void addProduct(java.lang.String name,
                       long id,
                       java.lang.String specialStock,
                       double weight,
                       java.lang.String weightUnit,
                       double basePrice,
                       java.lang.String category)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Adds a new product to the productList. The parameters name, id, stock, weight and basePrice are entered by the user. The category will be supplied by the category list and will not be entered separately.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the new product
        id - the identification number of the new product
        specialStock - the amount of units of the new product
        weight - the weight of the product
        weightUnit - the unit of the given weight e.g. g,kg,ml,l,stück
        basePrice - the base price of the product
        category - the category the product will be assigned to
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if product id is already used by a product in the list

      • searchProduct

        public java.util.ArrayList<Product> searchProduct(java.lang.String search)
        Searches the productList for a product with this name.
        Parameters:
        search - The search phrase that is looked for in the productList
        Returns:
        a list of products with the same name as the search phrase, or where the given search phrase is part of the name

      • saveToProductDatabase

        public void saveToProductDatabase()
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Saves all products to the ProductDatabase. The save function will be executed only once when the application is closed, because the way the product list is implemented represents an inMemory database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the the file the writer accesses is non existent

      • loadFromProductDatabase

        public void loadFromProductDatabase()
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads all Products from the ProductDatabase. The load function will be executed only once when the application is started, because the way the product list is implemented represents an inMemory database. Throws IO Exception if there is no file or a wrong path declared to read from.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if the the file the reader accesses is non existent

      • getProductList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Product> getProductList()
        Returns the productList.
        Returns:
        the productList
